title: The Symbiotic Relationship Between the Rabbit and the Black Panther
summary:
I was a rabbit shapeshifter who couldn't even transform into a human by my coming of age ceremony. My family said that I was just a halfling and placed me in a basket…

"You're crying? Go on, cry more."

Then I was then picked up by a black panther with an awful personality.

"You're lacking in fighting spirit. I'll eat you the day after tomorrow, so keep trying."

This fierce beast. Staring at my trembling face, the black panther's eyes glistened.

"How thrilling."

Mom, I think he's crazy! To survive a fairly crazy black panther.

"The wild beasts are possessive, no matter what it is."

…Is it possible?

---
Vivi is a... wererabbit?! As a creature that’s supposed to transform into a human, Vivi is a failure, demonized as cursed and sent off to her doom. Luckily, her demise is cut short as Ahin of the Black Leopard Clan saves her. But with every threat and command this temperamental heir tosses at Vivi, she’s questioning her safety (and sanity). Surrounded by carnivores and their strong pheromones, she'll try to survive the chaos while stuck in her rabbit form. Will she figure out how to transform and tap into the power within her cute, furry self?

title: A Capable Maid
summary:
As Maurina, she's on the run as the last of her kingdom’s royal line. Disguised as Marie, she is just a maid, serving the victorious empire. She’s never been very good at anything, so when she's told to make a wish, she asks for the ability to help others and bring them happiness. Now as visions of brilliant and skilled people fill her dreams, she’s imbued with a bounty of abilities perfectly suited for any dilemma. But will her secrets last as the crown prince seeks out both Maurina and Marie?

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=53159698)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/a-talented-maid/info)
* [Simplified Chinese / 汉语](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/647461)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Marie-Sang-Pelayan-Berbakat/3337)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/35253)

title: Moonshark: Sharks Are Born To Be Stars
summary:
Princess Sid of the Underwater Kingdom is destined to inherit the throne of the sea. However, she becomes a fan of the land idol 'Raon', and she becomes eager to see her favourite star, so she runs away to the surface.
While leading a satisfying life as an ordinary fan, Sid's world is suddenly turned upside down when she meets the famous actor 'Jihan'. Unintentionally, the two keep getting entangled with each other, and Sid unexpectedly becomes an SNS star overnight…!!
This story captures Sid's journey of growth and love as she navigates her new life on land, discovering herself between the two worlds of the underwater kingdom and the human world.

---
Sid, who is a Shark Princess of the underwater kingdom, falls in love with Raun, a member of the boy band BUB, and runs away to the surface to see him. Things are going great until the famous teen actor, Jihan Kang, steps into her life unexpectedly and they keep crossing paths. Will Sid be able to keep her secret and get what she came up to the surface for?

title: The doomsday ruthless man: hoarding trillions of supplies at the beginning
summary: The earth is affected by unknown energy, the core expands, and natural disasters and doomsday come. Extreme heat, earthquakes, volcanic eruptions, floods, severe cold... natural and man-made disasters come one after another! Su Chen struggled through the apocalypse and finally entered the safe zone, but was betrayed by his girlfriend in the end! Reborn and returned to one month before the end. This time, I only live for myself!

title: The Indomitable Wanderer
summary:
I am a wanderer martial artist. I don’t shy away from blood, but I’m ready to retire. Should I take one last job? or not?

For many long years, he has roamed as a wandering martial artist's, living as a hired blade to make ends meet.

But now, he finds himself utterly penniless, living in poverty with nothing to his name.

As a master of martial arts at the peak level, he makes a decision, to take on one final, high-stakes mission, earn a fortune, and put an end to his life as a wanderer.

The story follows his journey as he takes on this last assignment and the unexpected twists that unfold along the way.

title: Standard of Reincarnation
summary:
Despite having only one arm, Daven had finally proven his worth after defeating his cousin Kazin in honorable combat. But Kazin took advantage of Daven’s mercy, stabbing him in the back and imprisoning him for life.

500 years later, the minor god Yulian is reborn and unknowingly summons Daven’s soul into the body of a young boy named Vincent Adenka.

As the pair work to reveal the truth of Daven and Kazin, Vincent must relearn the art of combat while Yulian discovers the art of reincarnation.

title: The Princess Blooms as a Crazy Flower
summary:
An outcast from the imperial family due to her freewheeling attitude and refusal to get married, Princess Melody Corbella wants nothing more than to live life on her own terms and protect the people of the empire. Using her secret powers to sneak out of the palace to influence affairs from behind the scenes, she ends up drawing the attention of the handsome imperial guard, Caisar Bethel. Though she avoided romance until now, could love finally bloom for this crazy flower?

---
“I, Melody Corbella, wish to marry him!” The rest of the table reacted in a cold enough manner for the Princess to feel ashamed, having raised her right arm vigorously with sparkles in her eyes.

And then, Prince Deimos broke the silence to open his mouth, “We must not send a nutcase like her, Your Majesty!!”

It was finally the moment where all of her crazy deeds in the past came to fruition; because the only way she could escape being sent off for Royal Marriage was to throw away the image of a Princess that everyone expected.

She chose to cut her hair short and be reborn as the Crazy Flower in the Royal Palace.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%A9%EB%85%80-%EB%AF%B8%EC%B9%9C-%EA%BD%83%EC%9C%BC%EB%A1%9C-%ED%94%BC%EC%96%B4%EB%82%98%EB%8B%A4/2994), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59603265)

* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/her-highness-the-wildflower/list?title_no=4860)

title: I Stole the Heroine’s First Love
summary:
“I am a knight of Latem. We’re not destined to stand under the same sky.”

She had become Karina Apocalita, the personification of evil and a member of the heterogeneous race that ruled the world with malevolence. The plot began to twist and turn when Karina unknowingly saved the life of Reneiger, a justful knight and the heroine’s first love.

Reneiger became doubtful of his faith, eventually losing his glow and radiant platinum blond. Soon the sacred knight fell from grace and aligned himself to Karina’s fate.

“There’s no turning back now. Dear God, please forgive me.”

He knew he would never be able to escape from her hands.

---
"I am a knight of Latem, and that means I cannot coexist under the same sky as you."

After entering the book *A Trapped Bird Cannot Escape*, I realized that I had taken over the body of Karina Apocalypta, a member of a species that reigns as the evil of the world. However, the novel's plot begins to twist after I saved the life of Reneiger, the first love of the female protagonist, who happens to be a holy knight. Reneiger begins to doubt his faith, ultimately losing his brilliant platinum hair. Thus, the once sacred holy knight turns corrupt and eventually sympathizes with Karina's fate...

"Now we have each other's desires," Karina said while caressing his cheek. It was a feeling of being pulled in by each fascinating tendril of thorny vines.

Reneiger couldn't bear it, "It can't be undone."

---
In a land overshadowed by darkness, Karina Apocalita rises as a formidable figure, her being a tapestry of power from a diverse race. Her destiny intertwines with Reneiger, a knight from the virtuous Latem order, known for justice and as the former love of a legendary heroine. Their paths take an unforeseen turn when Karina, unaware of her impact, saves Reneiger's life. This act, challenging his convictions, triggers a crisis within him, tarnishing his once radiant aura and precipitating a fall from grace.

Faced with his altered fate, Reneiger prays for forgiveness, realizing his escape from Karina's shadow is but a dream. This pivotal moment raises a haunting question: will Reneiger rediscover the light, or be consumed by the darkness emanating from Karina?

title: No More Regrets, Just Kill Me
summary:
Tsukishiro Yuina, a singer who lost her voice in a traffic accident, felt hopeless. In her despair, Yuina chose to end her life, but when she opened her eyes, she found herself in the world of a novel she had read before her death, The Saint Who Abandons Her Status.

She had possessed the body of the novel's villainess, Ariadeline. To make matters worse, it was at the point where the main protagonists were already married, and Ariadeline had been condemned.

Even in the world of the novel, her miserable situation didn't improve. Yuina (now Ariadeline) decided to take her own life again, but this time she was stopped by her former husband, Carlothian.

"I don't want you to die."

Even though he was the one who killed her in the original story, Carlothian repeatedly interfered with Ariadeline's attempts to end her life.

"Why won't you kill me like you did in the original story...?"

Thus begins the tale of the villainess who lost her dream, Ariadeline, and her tsundere former husband, Carlothian, as they attempt to redo their misunderstood love story.

title: World of Ten Billion
summary:
In the aftermath of Madorim's decline following the World War, a captivating tale unfolds as the maternal grandson, son of Lord Daesannim's daughter, returns to the city. Despite initial feelings of abandonment, he emerges as a figure of unexpected beauty in a martial arts world marked by rugged aesthetics.

Unveiling his true identity as the King of the Mu-myeon Mountain, a teenage expert who conquered the Dragon King of the Yellow River, the series promises a gripping narrative. Driven by his mother's last words and a determination to restore Madorim to its former glory, Jin Murip, this unparalleled teenage expert, arrives in Madorim.

title: It Was Just a Contract Marriage
summary:
The empress of a fallen nation was dragged to the enemy empire. Despite everything, the Treasure of Grandel was still gorgeous. However, in the end she was just a captive who was going to be hanged by the savages. Eliza wanted to avoid that outcome no matter what, even if she had to tell outrageous lies. There was only one option: the man known as Banella's guard dog, the enemy empire's commander, and a lowly and vicious warrior—Lezet Christian. Eliza had to convince this cold and obstinate man who stood before her.

In a trembling voice, she said, "I'll give you a child."

title: The Empress Wants To Avoid the Emperor
summary:
Born as an imperial princess, Arnoah was forced to marry the pathetic young king of a small neighboring kingdom. Her older brother became the emperor, so what was she supposed to do? And due to the laws of inheritance, even if her older brother and younger brother were to die, she would still not inherit the throne - rather, her good-for-nothing cheater of a husband would!! Any title she inherits would be vested in her husband in accordance to their marriage contract... that is, until he decides to divorce her because his mistress wants to be the official queen.

“I need to get divorced and become the emperor.”

Her now official ex-husband still doesn't seem to get it, so she decided to finally tell him everything she always wanted to say to his face. When he realized the truth, it was already too late. She spoke to her ex-husband who had his mouth agape.

“I told you to keep your head straight. Didn’t you hear me?”

---
Revenge is sweet. Divorce? Even sweeter.

Arnoa is trapped in a loveless marriage in which she has sacrificed both her heart and dignity. In the midst of such matrimonial misery, she receives the chance to claim the Empire as her own. There's just one catch: she needs a divorce to make it happen! Will she succeed in getting the last laugh?

title: It Was Love at First Sight, Mr. Villain!
summary:
Duke Adler, referred to as the greatest man of the Asgard Empire, is as handsome as a sculpture. However, he is also a serial killer, playing the role of the villain in a novel. On top of that, Princess Charlotte, who was politically married to him, was fated to be murdered on their first night together.

The predicament is that I am the princess fated to die at his hands on that night.

"It's a political marriage, and it's not as if we want to see each other anyway, so let's just meet on our wedding day."

It was evident that the villain was displeased with the idea of marrying me. Hence, I made a decision.

"It was love at first sight. So, please go out with me!"

With only six months left until the wedding, I resolved to carry out an undercover investigation by pretending to date him. People wouldn't believe my words, so I had no choice but to gather evidence myself.

Even though she had planned to reveal the fact that he was a serial killer by hovering around him...

***

"You said you fell in love with me at first sight, so what were you doing here with another man?"

A cold voice flowed into my ears.

"W-What do you mean? I was just dancing to ensure there were no disruptions at the banquet..."

The nape of my neck heated up from the hot breath brushing against the outer edges of my ear. The contrast between his warm touches and the cool tone of his voice intoxicated me even more.

"You called his name so affectionately, as he held you tightly in his arms."
"Gasp."

Unable to escape the strong scent that clouded my senses, I held my breath. My whole body tingled from the strange sensation spreading from my neck to the rest of my body. He tilted his head and said...

"If there's someone else's scent coming from you... I'll have an urge to kill."

title: Divorce Plan
summary:
I already possess the body of a woman who will marry the devil. In a role haunted by her husband until death.

"I will always be by your side!"

I've decided to be nice to this poor husband for a while. But before one day, when I had reached adulthood and planned to divorce. A little angel appeared in the night full of surprises. Oh, man. So I tried to run away before being discovered…

"Richard? Something's not right…"

"I have no intention of letting you run away, even if you die, you must stay in my arms. Elisha."

Trying to cry and beg with a pretty face is also not possible.

"Where are you going to take our child?"

Did he even chase after me with those cold eyes? …I guess I was wrong to run away like this. How to solve this situation?

---
After losing her parents at an early age, noble lady Elissa Lohengrin is brought into the powerful House Rubelin by the duke so that she can marry his grandson, Richard. However, having read this story in her past life, Elissa knows Richard is destined to murder her! To avoid this, Elissa makes a deal with Richard to divorce when they become adults. But as she plans for her future single life, Richard's feelings begin to grow, and a whirlwind of events begins that pulls Elissa closer to danger.

title: How to Save a Time-Limited Young Master
Food Truck Owner Inside the Dungeon
summary:
"Don't yearn for a world different from yours, just live a normal life."

Hunters, dungeons, I'm not interested in any of them.
My life followed one single path that's of cooking.
But the moment I was about to open my first long-awaited food truck....

[Class: You have awakened as a Food Truck Owner (Hidden)!]
[Item: Dungeon Business Permit (Personal/Non-Transferable)!]
- Business is only possible inside the dungeon

Min Jiun, 21 years old, awakened as the owner of a food truck inside the dungeon.

title: The S-Class Hunter Doesn’t Want to Be a Villainous Princess
summary:
S-class Hunter Kim Yiyoung can't wait to leave the novel she woke up in. She gets the chance after defeating the story's final boss, but instead of returning home, she's sent into another novel! Yiyoung becomes Lady Renee Markious, a petty villainess who's just been framed for murder. Fortunately, Yiyoung has a secret weapon nobody knows about… her skills from her past life! Can Yiyoung clear Renee's name and find her way back to her own world? Or will she be trapped in this tale for good?

---
"I'm done with romance, so send me home!"

Kim Yi-Young was just an ordinary civil service exam candidate in South Korea.
After studying for more than four and a half years, she finally passed, a truly ordinary person with nothing but reading novels here and there as a hobby.

However, on the day she went out for a celebratory meal after passing the exam, she got into a traffic accident and died, only to find herself reincarnated into the fantasy hunter novel she was reading.

To her, the "System" offered a way back home.
Determined solely to return home and cuddle her warm cat and adorable Maltese, Cerberus, she gained strength through dozens of regressions.

Signing contracts with the constellations of the original work and dying multiple times, she eventually succeeded in conquering the "Tower" of the original work and defeating the owner of the tower on the final floor.

Now, all that's left is to go home......

Or so she thought!

[Due to an error, instead of returning to the original world, we will reincarnate you into the author's new work!]

I don't need that! All I wanted was my sweet home! Is that so difficult?! I even got rid of the Tower!?

Moreover, romance fantasy?! Even in my previous life, I didn't care about romance, not one bit!
And to top it off, I didn't even reincarnate into my own body this time, but into the "villainess" of the book!

I'm not afraid of the threats in this world, but I'm worried about being forced into a romance quest.

"Can I go home...?"

title: My Dead Lover Returned as a Tyrant
A Romantic Ending with My 2D Boyfriend!
summary: From flirts to mama’s boys to married men, intentionally Sun Choi keeps dating men like those. Promising to herself, not to date men like those ever again, she developed a game called ‘Dating Simulation.’ Since its release is just around the corner that she went to work even on the weekend and played the game as a developer. She plays a ‘share house version’ where you can meet various men of various classes all at once. However, she gets wakes up in the game as the female character.

title: MOONLIGHT LIBRARY
summary:
In an empire where women are forbidden from learning the ancient language, Luna cross-dresses as "Lou" to work as an ancient language translator. Sure, her actions are punishable by death, but what haunts her more are the depressing details of her future self's diary from the mysterious library in her dreams. Making money as a translator is the fastest way she can leave her uncaring uncle's house and change her dismal future.

However, Luna's main client happens to be her cousin's fiance, Duke Rothenbern, who gets drugged with a potent love potion and needs her "assistance" detoxifying it...

title: Savage Castle
summary: Due to his uncle's conspiracy, the king leaves the throne and hides in a desolate land. The story unfolds with the king and a pitiful yet beautiful noble lady, who has made him her slave, entangled in obsession and affection.

title: Can We Become a Family?
summary:
Adopted from a poor, rural orphanage by a wealthy duke, Naviah Agnus wanted nothing but to win her new father’s heart. Despite her best efforts, the calculating Duke only sees Naviah as a pawn, a mere stand-in for his terminally-ill daughter, Vivian, who was set to marry the crown prince. But when Vivian miraculously recovers, Naviah is pushed aside and driven to her own death. When she wakes up, she is eight-years old again, but this time, Naviah is done playing nice. Can they ever really become family?

---
"Navia Agnes," adopted to marry the Crown Prince on behalf of Duke Agnes's daughter with a time limit. 

“I really want to be family.”

Navia, who held on to her family’s affection, did her best to become an Empress even while being abused. However, once Vivian, the Duke’s real daughter, is cured, she is abandoned by her family. No, it would be right to say that she was abandoned on all occasions.

“Just how much more effort do I have to make? If I want to be your family,” Navia took off her blood-soaked gloves. 

Then on her right wrist, a number that couldn’t be seen by others appeared. 

"1" 

She calmly admitted, looking down on the number, “I’m going to stop playing with my family now.”

At that moment, the number on her wrist changed. 

"0" 

Just like that, her life began again. 

“If you messed with me, you’re gonna pay for it.”

Will she be able to find a temporary family who will protect her until she becomes of age, and get revenge on Duke Agnes?

---
[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/54747988)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9A%B0%EB%A6%AC%EA%B0%80-%EA%B0%80%EC%A1%B1%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%A0-%EC%88%98-%EC%9E%88%EC%9D%84%EA%B9%8C%EC%9A%94/2972), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57809482)

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/82445)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B0%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%89%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B0/295)

title: ??? Rank no Ura Soubi Musou
summary: What would you do if you suddenly regained memories of your past life and realized you were living in a world that was once a game you played? Jinfrey chooses to use his knowledge as an OG gamer and exploit the game’s secrets so he can become an unparalleled adventurer. But he’ll have to be careful because if he dies, it’s game over! Will he be able to find all of the hidden rank equipment, defeat the bosses, and give his family the life they deserve?

title: Should I Make You a Nuclear Weapon?
summary:
Director Kim Jun of the Defense Science Research Institute faces a tragic end while protecting the ADD chip, a military secret of South Korea, during a terrorist attack in 2024.

However, he suddenly finds himself with an unexpected opportunity: he is reborn in the body of his friend Jeon Hyun-seung, who died in 1998!

Revived as Kim Jun, he discovers that he can access future technologies using the ADD chip engraved in his body.

"If you give me the chance... I’ll show you what I can create within three months."

Create the ultimate weapon to overcome the IMF crisis with future technology! Let me know if you need anything else!

title: Trait Hoarder
summary:
Junsu is an ordinary college student who spends an extraordinary amount of time trying to beat a pay-to-win hero collector game called Arcane Seoul. 

All his hours of painstaking gameplay finally pays off when he lands Cheonma, one of the ultimate SS-ranked characters in the game, seconds before a truck runs him over. Now, he finds himself as Jeonsa Kim, a basic tutorial-stage character who can learn any skill. 

Can he use his gaming knowledge to survive the godforsaken, magic-driven, and monster-ridden alternate world of Arcane Seoul?

title: A Villain’s Will to Survive
summary:
Ragna, the heir to a frontier noble family, is a reincarnated former Japanese citizen who realizes that the world he now lives in is the setting of an otome game. Dreaming of a carefree life as an adventurer, his plans are derailed when a war takes his family, forcing him to take on the responsibilities of managing his family’s lands. Struggling with the unfamiliar duties of a lord, his already chaotic life takes another turn when an unexpected engagement to a noblewoman from a higher-ranking family is arranged.

To his surprise, the bride-to-be is Alicia, the "villainess" of the otome game's story — a character destined for heartbreak, a demonic pact, and ultimate destruction. Now sharing his life with someone fated for tragedy, Ragna is swept up in the wheels of fate. Can he rewrite the predetermined outcomes of this world and secure a peaceful life for himself and Alicia?

title: The Best Martial Arts Instructor In The World
summary: The Demonic Cult Leader, Seok Woncho, was a monster who even surpassed the Blood Cult Leader. Do you know who killed him? “Ha Mu-baek.” “But why are you bringing that up…?” “Because he’s coming to our Mengryong Academy as an instructor.” …Damn it. We’re screwed! Ha Mu-baek, the greatest martial artist who crushed both the Demonic Cult and the Blood Cult, is now assigned as an instructor at a martial arts training academy due to a political power struggle. Determined to live quietly while keeping his identity hidden, he soon finds himself solving the problems of cadets with heart-wrenching backstories, disciplining the trashy human scum at the academy, and inexplicably becoming busier by the day… Welcome! It’s your first time meeting a genius lunatic instructor, isn’t it?!

title: Baby Snow Leopard of the Black Leopard Family
summary: A child, born a hybrid and abused to death by her maternal grandfather, is reborn with memories of her past life. Faced with the same fate, she seeks out her estranged father for protection until adulthood. Expecting rejection, she is instead met with love and acceptance from her father, siblings, and grandfather—who even offers her the family leadership.

title: Isn’s This Inside the Game?
summary: A guild master, once ranked number one, wakes up 500 years in the future after winning a major siege. The guild is gone, the world feels strange, and everything has fallen apart. Determined to rebuild the guild and adapt to this unfamiliar time, they embark on a journey to restore their legacy and conquer the challenges of the new era.

title: The Summer Swallowed by Darkness
summary:
After her grandmother’s passing, Na Suhyeon returns to her hometown, leaving behind her city life.

Drawn by an inexplicable force, she climbs Obong Mountain—a place her grandmother had strictly forbidden her from entering while alive.

Lost deep in the woods and facing a mysterious danger, Suhyeon is rescued by a man named Seo Munju, who appears unharmed even after being beheaded.

Munju claims that Suhyeon is the reincarnation of Gang Yuhwa, his former spiritual mother and a shaman, and that the strange occurrences began when she set foot on the mountain.

Though wary of Munju, Suhyeon witnesses the chaos caused by vengeful spirits empowered by stolen sacred relics once buried in Gang Yuhwa’s grave. Moved by a sense of responsibility, she decides to help recover the five relics.

Munju suspects that the evil spirit who once drove Gang Yuhwa to her death is now reacting to Suhyeon’s aura and desecrated her grave.

Now, Suhyeon and Munju set out to confront tormented spirits and reclaim the relics.

Can they exorcise the evil spirit and end Munju’s eternal curse?

title: I Got A Job At A Haunted Mansion
I Need a Sponsor
summary: When I opened my eyes, I became the head of a vicious director of a nursery school that absed the main characters. It was nice to see the abse scene from the first appearance and to prevent it in a cool way. Now, the nursery is in danger of collapsing due to a pile of debt before the children are all raised. I can’t starve my children! I will protect my children! After all, she provoked the Duke at the risk of her life, and even achieved sponsorship, and now she thought she only had to raise her children with love. “Why is the only thing that’s being asked to protect are them?” “They’re weak. I’m fine.” “Siela, please don’t say that the sponsorship is about to end.” He, who was only described as cold, keeps touching me. Even young children who overcame their wounds and opened their hearts to me. And the man, whose expression of coldness melts in front of me!

title: Deadly Strong
summary: In his previous life, Su Ye stood as the last survivor amidst the world’s ultimate cataclysmic battle, a poignant witness to the downfall of humanity. However, after his demise, he inexplicably awoke to find himself reborn ten years into the past. Faced with impending and unparalleled challenges, he is resolute in his determination to lead everyone to triumph!

title: Legend of the Reincarnated Demon God
summary:
The Junior Heavenly Demon, Yeon Woon-hwi, was born without a dantian.

However, through dark arts and his shitty personality— er, preternatural ability, he became the junior lord of the Heavenly Demon Cult.

He was a man of many epithets:

‘Great Sorcerer of the Dark Arts’

'King of the Wandering Lost Souls’

But the people’s assessment of him was simple:

“If he smiles, run as fast as you can. His smile is a death sentence.”

“Catch his eye, for he shall provide you with lifelong protection. That is, if you can.”

He was living the good life, when suddenly, he was betrayed in a coup led by the vice-lord and elders of his cult.

“You seem to have forgotten what kind of person I am, Uncle. So die. All of you."

Using the holy relic of the first Heavenly Demon, he self-destructed, taking the traitors with him. And then, he opened his eyes to the most unexpected of places...

"I'm in the Tang Clan? And a branch family at that?"

He awoke as Tang Woon-hwi, an illegitimate son of the Nine Dragon Branch Family, a subset of the Sichuan Tang Clan.

Will Woon-hwi be able to find his master, bring together his scattered followers, and rebuild the Heavenly Demon Cult?

title: Unrivaled Spear Demon
summary:
Shuji, a soldier who danced with death many times while on the battlefield, was possessed by the grudges and resentment of those he had killed. He too was eventually killed, but somehow he awoke in a younger version of himself.

He returned to a time when he was still an errand boy, inexperienced with war, but retained his memories. Remembering Kyo Aiyo, his comrade and savior, Shuji travelled to the ‘Tiger Pit’ Sect. However, instead of the strong and reliable woman, he was met with a cheerful and petite girl. He recalled the tragic past that had caused her to devote herself to the army, where in his previous life her family had fallen apart due to false rumors.

‘This time, I will protect you.’

He vowed to repay the kindness he received in his previous life by changing her fate. With a spear in his right hand, Shuji steps into the battlefield once again, becoming the Unrivaled Spear Demon.

title: Player Elimination Plan! When Anomalies Descend Upon The Human World
summary: The apocalypse prophecy has come true. A dark celestial body draws near, turning the entire Blue Star into a doomsday game. All of humanity has been reduced to NPCs—helpless prey for players from beyond the stars. As the world mutates and players run rampant, despair consumes mankind… Until Yun Qi awakens a hidden class, gaining the power to strike back against the players.

title: The Night After the Divorce
summary:
A year ago, Kaho married Shinya, who worked at an advertising agency. Their married life ended abruptly when she discovered his infidelity.

The void in her heart was unexpectedly filled by Iori, a younger college student. "I'm here for you, Kaho."

Though drawn to Iori, Kaho now faces pressure from Shinya to reconcile. Torn between two men, she must choose:

"Do I embrace this new love? Or repair what was broken?"

title: You Can Hear It
summary: Ryouran High School is a private arts academy where geniuses in every field—music, dance, fashion—gather. But in reality, looks decide the students' success, not talent. My sister, Shiika Ikebukuro, is a shut-in who can't do anything without her older brother, and I was sure that devastating lack of charisma would doom her. But I know a secret. Though you'd never guess it, behind her mask, the internet sensation VSINGER is none other than my sister, Shiika! Her voice is one of a kind, but will it be enough to overcome Ryouran High's entire social order?

title: Mr Mo’s Secret
summary: A father who mysteriously disappeared, a mother who killed herself and clues that lie in a web of secrets. To find the truth, I decided to make an unspoken transaction with Mr. Mo, the most powerful man in the city. Who would have thought that a sweet man could be summoned with a kiss! One moment as cold as frost, one moment as hot as a stove, a boyfriend with such duality, I want it all. The quirky girlfriend vs a two-faced catlike tycoon, under the stars, till the end of time, I will only love…

title: The Cold-Blooded Warrior
summary:
The witch Hildegar, who received the blessing of the Sun Goddess Karia, is known far and wide for her fearsome reputation.  
The Northerner Elkin, who lost his homeland, chases after the witch towards a nameless castle…

title: Surviving as an Illegitimate Princess
summary:
"Don't look down on me just because I'm a child! Even though I look like this, this is my 10th life!"

I'm an illegitimate princess whose life was cut short after being misunderstood for having the same blood as the enemy country and died early. After nine tragic repetitions, I discovered the identity of my biological father. He is Paeon, a war hero who defeated the demon king and the strongest holy knight in the continent. He had a forbidden relationship with the princess, had me, and then deserted me!

In order to survive the harsh royal palace, I've decided to use and then abandon this impudent father. I will become the strongest as fast as I can and escape from this disgusting country!

And so, while I was building my strength, I happened to meet the demon king's son, Leo. He wasn't arrogant like his father, but he was pitifully living in captivity. So, I took care of him in secret.

"Asha, you cannot get engaged to anyone."

"...Huh? Why?"

"Because I’ll take responsibility for you forever."

"What?!"

"We spent the night together."

...What is this prince saying?

A holy knight father who had (?) a forbidden love. Along with an enemy prince who is trying (!) to have a forbidden love. With them, can the unfortunate princess change her fate?

---
As an illegitimate princess, Anastasia Entimos has died in just about every way imaginable. Every time she dies, she is brought back to the moment of her birth and forced to relive her tragic fate. It is only in her 10th life that she discovers her father is the esteemed knight and war hero, Paeon Parschel! Determined to escape her miserable fate once and for all, Anastasia vows to use her aloof father as a stepping stone to freedom. Will the 10th time be the charm for this ill-fated princess?

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55912087), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8639242)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%82%AC%EC%83%9D%EC%95%84-%EA%B3%B5%EC%A3%BC%EB%A1%9C-%EC%82%B4%EC%95%84%EB%82%A8%EA%B8%B0/2966), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59761866)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/surviving-as-the-illegitimate-princess/info)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E7%A7%81%E7%94%9F%E5%85%AC%E4%B8%BB%E7%94%9F%E5%AD%98%E8%A8%98/369)
* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/928)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Surviving-as-the-Illegitimate-Princess/608)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/117224)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%98%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%88%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%8D%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AA/437)

title: Genius Martial Arts Trainer
summary:
Demons came pouring from a portal that appeared out of nowhere and caused the Cataclysm. But all hope is not lost thanks to the Awakeners, people who can fight these demons. 

Lee Jun, a D-rank Awakener, is one of them. He fought demons heroically, but as someone who inherited nothing from his family, he could only go so far. 

As Jun Lee’s life slowly whittled away, a system message appeared, informing him that a special martial arts route had opened...

title: Tears on a Withered Flower
summary: Na Hae-soo's life unravels when her husband betrays her with an affair, leaving her burdened with debt and losing their child. In a devastating blow, she witnesses him with a younger woman. Broken and despondent, Na Hae-soo feels her life crumbling around her. However, a mysterious young man unexpectedly enters her life, asking to be taught about adult love. His vulnerability and sincerity begin to stir emotions within Na Hae-soo, challenging her to reconsider her path forward.

title: Try Begging Me
summary:
Sato Itto, an ordinary salaryman, has been shy about love due to an old trauma. Then one day, a reunion is held for the first time in several years. While they are having a good time talking about the good old days, suddenly Hebo, who has become an idol currently on hiatus, decides to attend the reunion!

Sato is upset to see Hebo, who was his first love. He manages to get over it with the help of alcohol, which he does not normally drink. When he wakes up, he finds the two of them naked in the same bed. As Sato desperately tries to recall his memories, Hebo shockingly says to him...!

"Marry me..."

What will happen to the marriage between the two who have no experience with love...!?

title: The Female Lead’s Mother and the Male Lead’s Father Are Married
Regressed Genius Creates Mythic Items
summary:
On the day of the Earth's destruction, Level 1 Alchemist Kim Si-moon forged the Philosopher's Stone, which can do anything if an equivalent exchange is established.

[What do you desire?]

Right now, all he want is to destroy the Earth, to give the man responsible for his brother's death a good kicking, and to live a life without magic! 

He thought he'd ended his life full of regrets... yet he woke up 11 years in the past.

This time, he'll undo his miserable life as a disenchanted person and all the suffering that will happen in the future! 

Follow Si-moon's journey to change the future with his partner, the Philosopher's Stone!

title: I’m a Fake Saintess but the Gods are Obsessed
summary:
I reincarnated into the body of a fake saintess who will die when the real saintess appears five years later. If I were to gather the monthly allowance given to the saintess I can at the very least buy a building! But while I was carefully setting up a plan to run away after playing the role of the saintess... 

"Choose me, or else..." 

"I prepared a prison just for you. My goddess—" 

"..." 

The male leads reacted differently than I expected. 

[The bored divine beings have started to gain interest after watching you.] 

I, Ariel, unexpectedly gained the interest of the gods. On top of that, the final boss who is planning on destroying the world isn't killing me, but helping me...? I have no interest in gaining the interest of the gods or destroying the world! So please just let me become a landlord like I wanted—!

title: The Returned C-Rank Tank Won’t Die!
summary: A C-rank tank, abandoned by her teammates to die, awakens a rare regenerative ability after enduring countless deaths. Now immortal but traumatized, she must decide her next move in a world that betrayed her.

title: Kneel, Your Grace!
summary: Everyone has had the urge to punch their infuriating boss, but actually going through with it is hard. Especially when that boss is a war hero and a grand duke, no less. Chloe could only grit her teeth as she watched Curtis constantly conduct service inspections… but then, a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity presented itself. The king ordered Curtis to marry a noblewoman from another country, and he put forward his lieutenant, Chloe, as his lover. Now, the gun was in her hands… “First, get on your knees, Your Grace.”
